item.title: Majority Rules Episode 24 Temporary Insanity
item.description: Becky hires a timid temp when Mrs. D goes on vacation. But things go awry when Becky teaches the temp to have more confidence and a laid back approach to life.

item.title: Majority Rules Episode 23 Me And My Shadow
item.description: Kiki finds her new love a bit suffocating, and decides to get an anti-makeover to get rid of him. Meanwhile, Jack and Becky set up their first official date.

item.title: Majority Rules Episode 22 Strange Bedfellows
item.description: Becky is exposed to the dark side of politics when Hop Ling's is shut down by the health department.

item.title: Majority Rules Episode 21 G Is For Gavel
item.description: Margo makes an independent film about a corrupt mayor and a young girl mayor. She casts Becky in the lead, without testing her acting abilities first!

item.title: Majority Rules Episode 20 Boo Who Too?
item.description: Rebecca 'Becky' Richards is your typical skateboarding, computer game playing 15-year-old, that is until she accidentally becomes a candidate for mayor of her town, Mayfield - and wins! CAST: Tracy Spiridakos

item.title: Majority Rules Episode 19 Boo Who?
item.description: Becky hears noises while working late and begins to suspect that City Hall may be haunted. She mentions it to her friends and Jack tells them the tale of Lord Mayfield who died in City Hall.

item.title: Majority Rules Episode 18 Lost In The Woods
item.description: Becky and Jack have signed up for a wilderness challenge at a secret location. But they both miss the bus which leaves the school on Saturday morning, so they decide to kill some time by having free rein at the school.

item.title: Majority Rules Episode 17 Opposites Detract
item.description: Kiki's family is going away for a week and Becky decides to take Kiki in. At first both girls are excited but when messy Becky finds out Kiki is a neat-freak their friendship is tested.

item.title: Majority Rules Episode 16 Art Show
item.description: The city budget needs to be trimmed and leading the way is a heavy funding cut for the arts. This hits close to home for budding artist Becky. Becky initiates a student art show to protest the school board's arts cuts.

item.title: Majority Rules Episode 15 Becky Takes A Pass
item.description: Becky receives two free tickets to see her favourite band Spatial Perception. The problem is they are also the favourite band of Margo and Kiki. The two girls begin to compete for the other ticket.

item.title: My Place Episode 1 1878 Henry
item.description: Henry believes he's a brilliant inventor. When he accidently blows up the school house he's expelled and has to find a way to get back in. The trouble is, his plan involves more inventions. CAST: Alexander Graham, Rob Carlton

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 8 Part 3 : Album Covers
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 8 Part 2 : Album Covers
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 8 Part 1 : Album Covers
item.description: With help from singers Kate Alexa and Jessica Mauboy, hosts Joel and Nicole investigate Verity's question - 'how do you get into drawing album covers?'

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 7 Part 3 : Festivals
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 7 Part 2 : Festivals
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 7 Part 1 : Festivals
item.description: In this episode the show takes you behind the scenes of the music industry, hosts Joel and Nicole explore Brittany's question - 'what goes on at a music festival?!'

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 6 Part 3 : Behind The Scenes At A Concert
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 6 Part 2 : Behind The Scenes At A Concert
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 6 Part 1 : Behind The Scenes At A Concert
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 5 Part 3 : Music Video
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 5 Part 2 : Music Video
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 5 Part 1 : Music Video
item.description: In this episode of the show that takes you behind the scenes of the music industry, hosts Joel and Nicole jump into the music video business to explore the viewer's question - How can I make a music video?

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 4 Part 3 : Music Producer
item.description: In this episode of the show that takes you behind the scenes of the music industry, hosts Joel and Nicole seek out the spirit of music to answer the viewer's question - What is it that music producers actually do?!

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 4 Part 2 : Music Producer
item.description: In this episode of the show that takes you behind the scenes of the music industry, hosts Joel and Nicole seek out the spirit of music to answer the viewer's question - What is it that music producers actually do?!

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 4 Part 1 : Music Producer
item.description: In this episode of the show that takes you behind the scenes of the music industry, hosts Joel and Nicole seek out the spirit of music to answer the viewer's question - What is it that music producers actually do?!

item.title: Stoked Episode 4 Will The Real Broseph Please Stand Up
item.description: Reef and Fin are excited when Hollywood star Noah Little arrives at the hotel and needs surf lessons for an upcoming movie role. But while Reef and Fin bicker over who gets to teach him, Noah gloms on to Broseph instead!

item.title: Stoked Episode 3 The Captain, The Grom, His Job, Her Dream
item.description: After a terrible day on the job thanks to Lo's slacking and Reef's tormenting, Fin applies for a job as surf instructor with rival hotelier Captain Ron. Reef doesn't want Fin to leave, so he tries to jinx her interview.

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 5 Ear Wax Elf
item.description: Howie has to be extra nice to his pals so that the Ear Wax Elf will come and leave him a gift for his latest blob of wax.

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 4 Keep On Monster Truckin'
item.description: Howie finds a lost toy that when you add water to it becomes a monster truck!

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 3 There Are No Small Parts
item.description: Howie auditions to become Dirk Danger's new movie sidekick - but Octo gets the job!

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 2 One Star Hotel
item.description: The Banana Cabana needs to get one star from a reviewer, or Howie will lose the hotel.

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 1 It's My Party
item.description: This animated comedy series features Howie and his misfit gang of shaved, underwear-clad animals who work at the beachfront hotel Banana Cabana, where there are no parents, no rules and no clothes... well almost!

item.title: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab Episode 26 (Final Episode)
item.description: An entertaining and educational science game show jam-packed with the most spectacular stunts and awesome experiments on television. Two teams compete with each other to win prizes by battling it out over four rounds.

item.title: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab Episode 25
item.description: An entertaining and educational science game show jam-packed with the most spectacular stunts and awesome experiments on television. Two teams compete with each other to win prizes by battling it out over four rounds.

item.title: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab Episode 24
item.description: An entertaining and educational science game show jam-packed with the most spectacular stunts and awesome experiments on television. Two teams compete with each other to win prizes by battling it out over four rounds.

item.title: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab Episode 23
item.description: An entertaining and educational science game show jam-packed with the most spectacular stunts and awesome experiments on television. Two teams compete with each other to win prizes by battling it out over four rounds.

item.title: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab Episode 22
item.description: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab - Richard Hammond's Blast Lab is an entertaining and anarchic studio-based science family game show set in the surreal world of Richard Hammond's secret laboratory, found under the watermill of his fictitious country mansion. Nothing is ever quite as it seems in this exciting, surreal and action-packed show.

item.title: Parallax Episode 1
item.description: 14-year-old Ben discovers that his quiet town is a gateway to a parallel universe. In that world is a sister he didn't know he had, his mother is a Guardian of the Parallax and the Welkin are about to destroy the world.

item.title: Short Cuts Episode 26 Cut
item.description: The big day is looming and there are wedding jitters for Mr Long and Miss Petersen. When the kids find out that Miss Petersen has landed a job in Greenland they decide to stop the wedding.

item.title: Short Cuts Episode 25 As A Row Of Tents
item.description: The class heads into the bush for the school camp. No one is very keen apart from Ruth and Kurt who see it as a chance to sneak off together and Mr Long who will be able to spend time with Miss Petersen.

item.title: Short Cuts Episode 24 Survivor
item.description: With Mr Long teaching PE and the Year 9 students locked out of the TV studio, drastic measures are called for. Led by Sophie, the class stage a strike. Everyone is prepared to take part - except Ross.

item.title: Short Cuts Episode 23 Cops And Robbers
item.description: The class has been getting complaints about their programming of the student TV channel so they decide to create an original film for broadcast. The cops and robbers film is going well until they are all arrested!

item.title: 6Teen Episode 7 Pillow Talk
item.description: An animated comedy set entirely in a gigantic shopping mall. Follows six 16-yr-old friends as they try to make it through their first part-time jobs and life as a teenager.

item.title: 6Teen Episode 6 Unhappy Anniversary
item.description: An animated comedy set entirely in a gigantic shopping mall. Follows six 16-yr-old friends as they try to make it through their first part-time jobs and life as a teenager.

item.title: 6Teen Episode 5 Awake The Wyatt Within
item.description: An animated comedy set entirely in a gigantic shopping mall. Follows six 16-yr-old friends as they try to make it through their first part-time jobs and life as a teenager.

item.title: 6Teen Episode 4 Fish And Make Up
item.description: An animated comedy set entirely in a gigantic shopping mall. Follows six 16-yr-old friends as they try to make it through their first part-time jobs and life as a teenager.

item.title: Good Game SP Episode 20
item.description: Good Game SP is the show for younger gamers by gamers.

item.title: Good Game SP Episode 19
item.description: Good Game SP is the show for younger gamers by gamers.

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 9 Noradz The Clean
item.description: Our heroes find themselves in front of nine men in long red robes who have whips in their hands! It looks like Lief and the gang has accidentally turned up in a land called Noradz instead of the City of Rats...

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 8 Tom's Curious Shop
item.description: After defeating Thaegan the Sorceress at the Lake of Tears, Lief and friends hurry on their way to the City of Rats. But someone or something is following them. Is it a pack of wolves?

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 7 Sorceress Thaegan
item.description: Lief and the gang are at the Lake of Tears, where they're under attack from a monster named Soldeen. Soldeen offers the topaz gem in exchange for Manus and as Manus starts to enter the lake something amazing happens.

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 6 The Monster In The Lake Of Tears
item.description: Manus decides to join our heroes on their quest. His homeland is Raladin, and it's on the way to the Lake of Tears, so the group decides to stop there to pay a visit. But when they arrive, they're shocked by what they find.

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 5 Nij And Doj's Trap
item.description: Our heroes get chased through the forest by the Grey Guards after they rescue a Ralad man. They come across a little white house where an elderly couple, Jin and Jod, live. The nice couple invites the group in to escape.

item.title: In Real Life Episode 12 Firefighting: Part 2
item.description: An exciting new reality series where 18 kids race across North America and compete in an array of thrilling real-life challenges. In teams of two, they discover the skills, strength and stamina it takes to make it in real life. In each episode, the first team to successfully complete all the tasks and arrive at the finish line wins a reward they'll never forget.

item.title: In Real Life Episode 11 Firefighting: Part 1
item.description: An exciting new reality series where 18 kids race across North America and compete in an array of thrilling real-life challenges. In teams of two, they discover the skills, strength and stamina it takes to make it in real life. In each episode, the first team to successfully complete all the tasks and arrive at the finish line wins a reward they'll never forget.

item.title: In Real Life Episode 10 Farm Frenzy Part 2
item.description: An exciting new reality series where 18 kids race across North America and compete in an array of thrilling real-life challenges. In teams of two, they discover the skills, strength and stamina it takes to make it in real life. In each episode, the first team to successfully complete all the tasks and arrive at the finish line wins a reward they'll never forget.

item.title: In Real Life Episode 9 Farm Frenzy Part 1
item.description: An exciting new reality series where 18 kids race across North America and compete in an array of thrilling real-life challenges. In teams of two, they discover the skills, strength and stamina it takes to make it in real life. In each episode, the first team to successfully complete all the tasks and arrive at the finish line wins a reward they'll never forget.

item.title: In Real Life Episode 8 Experience No 4: Hollywood Stunt Performers: Part 2
item.description: An exciting new reality series where 18 kids race across North America and compete in an array of thrilling real-life challenges. In teams of two, they discover the skills, strength and stamina it takes to make it in real life. In each episode, the first team to successfully complete all the tasks and arrive at the finish line wins a reward they'll never forget.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 7 Shout Part 1
item.description: A neighbouring high school has merged with the junior high and things are a bit of a zoo. Amid the bustle, the students face new trials and tribulations - testing their friendships and beliefs.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 6 Drive
item.description: Joey is going away for the weekend with his latest girlfriend, and Craig is surprised when Joey tells him he can stay on his own - and even have the guys over!

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 5 Weird Science
item.description: Emma's a serious contender for first prize at the Science Fair - until the results of her experiment don't fall in line with her hypothesis.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 4 Karma Chameleon
item.description: Ash finds out what it feels like to be an outcast when rumours make her the victim of an orchestrated, school-wide shunning.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 3 Girls Just Want To Have Fun
item.description: When Spike reveals the identity of the mystery man she's been dating, Emma is shocked. Mr. Simpson - her teacher!

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 2 When Doves Cry Part 2
item.description: Although Craig's father has forbidden him to make contact with Joey and Angela, Craig can't seem to stop himself. Even when his father's unpredictable rages leave him black and blue.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 1 When Doves Cry Part 1
item.description: Summer's over and the kids are back. Degrassi alumni Joey Jeremiah and his small daughter Angela are the objects of someone's attention... it turns out to be Joey's charming and mysterious stepson, Craig.

item.title: The Assistants Episode 2 The Star
item.description: Gillian is surprised and pleased when office rival Rigby passes on what seems like to be a totally exciting assignment: 'assistant in charge' for Zak's movie starring Shane Baker, one of the biggest young stars in Hollywood.

item.title: The Assistants Episode 1 The Car
item.description: Follow the hilarious misadventures of four Hollywood assistants in the film industry as they experience the coolest and cruelest jobs while catering to every need of their boss; eccentric movie producer Zac del Toro.

item.title: Horrible Histories Live Action Episode 3
item.description: A Roman emperor finds a nasty alternative to candles, an Egyptian tries to save money on mummification, and the Roundheads and Cavaliers from the English Civil War take part in Historical Wife Swap.

item.title: Horrible Histories Live Action Episode 2
item.description: A Stone Age doctor tries to help a modern patient, a whining Pharaoh invents the pyramid, and Tudor King Henry VIII meets his dead friends.

item.title: Horrible Histories Live Action Episode 1
item.description: From the woeful World Wars, the miserable Middle Ages and the savage Stone Age to cut-throat Celts, groovy Greeks, rotten Romans, vile Vikings and awful Egyptians, history has never been so naughty.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 40 Mr Big Returns
item.description: For a school science competition, Doowee invents a machine that he says can predict the future. But before he can test it out, it is stolen. Sally and Doowee's first suspect is their old detective rival, Mr Big.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 39 Halloween Heist
item.description: The school is hosting a Halloween party in which all the sweets and candies that have been collected are to be shared among the students. But just as the party is about to begin, the lolly trolley is hijacked.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 38 The Shy Mystery
item.description: Martin comes to the SBI because his rabbit, Shy, seems to have changed during his holiday. He lent it to a friend, Jaya, to look after while he was away, but when he came back, the rabbit had totally changed personality...

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 37 The Midnight Stitch Up
item.description: Some pupils' clothes are secretly being altered by a mystery seamstress. They were all originally either dumped, lost or in poor condition, and are improved by the midnight stitch-up. The SBI investigates the mystery.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 36 The Formidable Miss Chicago
item.description: The kind maths teacher, Miss Smith, is having trouble keeping control of her rowdy class, so she walks out. The students are overjoyed, but Miss Smith is replaced by Miss Chicago, who is as tough as Miss Smith was kind.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 35 High School Musical Mystery
item.description: Sally Bollywood is a 12-year-old girl, who with the help of her neighbour and best friend Doowee, runs the 'Sally Bollywood Investigation' which provides a detective service exclusively to children.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 34 Mrs Apa's Old Friend
item.description: Sally Bollywood is a 12-year-old girl, who with the help of her neighbour and best friend Doowee, runs the 'Sally Bollywood Investigation' which provides a detective service exclusively to children.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 33 Close Protection
item.description: Sally Bollywood is a 12-year-old girl, who with the help of her neighbour and best friend Doowee, runs the 'Sally Bollywood Investigation' which provides a detective service exclusively to children.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 32 Bling Bling
item.description: Sally Bollywood is a 12-year-old girl, who with the help of her neighbour and best friend Doowee, runs the 'Sally Bollywood Investigation' which provides a detective service exclusively to children.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 31 The SBI Sees Double
item.description: Sally Bollywood is a 12-year-old girl, who with the help of her neighbour and best friend Doowee, runs the 'Sally Bollywood Investigation' which provides a detective service exclusively to children.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 30 Art For Art's Sake
item.description: A work of art about to be judged in the school art competition mysteriously disappears from a locked room. How did it disappear? Where did it go? Who took it and why? Sally and Dooowee investigate.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 29 The Attack Of The Giant Chicken
item.description: Jason, the school basketball champion, keeps having a recurring nightmare about being attacked by a giant chicken. Certain that his dream is connected to an accident at school, he asks the SBI to investigate.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 28 The Delayed Action Chilli Pepper
item.description: On the day of a big school swimming competition, all the students come down with a stomach illness, except Sally. The SBI investigates, but because Dowee is stuck at the school infirmary, they must swap roles.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 27 The Walls Of Cosmopolis
item.description: When school Principal gives graffiti taggers a wall to paint on, it is covered overnight in bad graffiti. Sam, who organised the official wall, believes it was vandalised by a rival tagger, and asks the SBI to investiage.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Epsiode 26 : That's Rock 'N' Roll
item.description: High school rock band, the Fuzzy Frogs, discover that one of their songs has been plagiarised by TV star, Dizzie Mulligan. Sally and Dowee have to prove that the song has been illegally copied and try to find out who did it.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 25 Cold Case
item.description: Sally and Dowee investigate a cold case: 30 years ago, when the Janitor was a student at the school, he was accused of stealing a trophy. Now the trophy has been returned, the Janitor wants the SBI to investigate.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 24 Serial Thief
item.description: Sally and Doowee are confronted by a serial thief who is stealing objects at school and giving them back damaged. The only link between the strange crimes is that the victims are all presidents of school clubs...

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 23 The Killer Curry
item.description: The best student in school is alarmed when his report card shows he has failed every subject except sport. Meanwhile a top athlete, who isn't very smart, has got an excellent report. Sally and Doowee investigate.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 22 Go Kart Wars
item.description: While practising for a go-kart race at the school, Mika, the race favourite, loses control of his kart and crashes. Believing it to be sabotage, Mika asks the SBI to investigate.

item.title: Sally Bollywood Episode 21 The Dating Agency
item.description: Miss Smith, has been behaving strangely. When the SBI investigate, they discover that Miss Smith is in love - but the man she has a crush on, Mr Jerome, the sports teacher, does not seem to be noticing her.

item.title: Young Dracula Episode 7
item.description: Single dad Count Dracula moves to Britain with his children, Vlad and Ingrid. To his father's horror, Vlad wants not to bite, but rather to fit in with his new-found friends, but it's not easy when you are one of the undead.

item.title: Young Dracula Episode 6
item.description: Single dad Count Dracula moves to Britain with his children, Vlad and Ingrid. To his father's horror, Vlad wants not to bite, but rather to fit in with his new-found friends, but it's not easy when you are one of the undead.

item.title: Young Dracula Episode 5
item.description: Single dad Count Dracula moves to Britain with his children, Vlad and Ingrid. To his father's horror, Vlad wants not to bite, but rather to fit in with his new-found friends, but it's not easy when you are one of the undead.

item.title: Young Dracula Episode 4
item.description: Single dad Count Dracula moves to Britain with his children, Vlad and Ingrid. To his father's horror, Vlad wants not to bite, but rather to fit in with his new-found friends, but it's not easy when you are one of the undead.

item.title: Young Dracula Episode 3
item.description: Single dad Count Dracula moves to Britain with his children, Vlad and Ingrid. To his father's horror, Vlad wants not to bite, but rather to fit in with his new-found friends, but it's not easy when you are one of the undead.

item.title: Young Dracula Episode 2
item.description: Single dad Count Dracula moves to Britain with his children, Vlad and Ingrid. To his father's horror, Vlad wants not to bite, but rather to fit in with his new-found friends, but it's not easy when you are one of the undead.

item.title: Young Dracula Episode 1
item.description: Single dad Count Dracula moves to Britain with his children, Vlad and Ingrid. To his father's horror, Vlad wants not to bite, but rather to fit in with his new-found friends, but it's not easy when you are one of the undead.

item.title: Connor Undercover Episode 9 Fear Itself
item.description: When a letter from enemy mastermind, Azul, shows up on Gisela's bedroom floor, Connor checks out this huge security breach and is pretty certain that Gisela's boyfriend, Andre, has something to do with it...

item.title: Connor Undercover Episode 8 Escape Artist
item.description: When a master spy nicknamed 'The Magician' escapes custody, Connor and Gisela pick the wrong time to accidentally handcuff themselves together!

item.title: Connor Undercover Episode 7 Crash Course
item.description: Connor must pull up his grade or miss out on awesome helicopter training! Meanwhile Gisela pilots her way to more adventure than she can handle.

item.title: Connor Undercover Episode 6 Secrets And Lies
item.description: Gisela's attempts to start her love-life prove futile until a new guy shows up at school. He's cute, he's worldly, and he's just what the Gisela ordered! But Connor is suspicious, and possibly a little jealous.

item.title: Connor Undercover Episode 5 Handy Candy
item.description: An enemy agent's device sets off a battle of wits between Connor and Gisela. Meanwhile, Ty attempts to go a whole day without candy!

item.title: Connor Undercover Episode 4 Whack-A-Mole
item.description: Connor searches for a mole in their midst. Meanwhile, Lily pesters Gisela to take her on a ski trip.

item.title: Connor Undercover Episode 3 Background Check
item.description: When Connor and Gisela look for dirt on rival Dillon, they turn up more than anybody expected. Meanwhile Tanya gets a surprise visit from the enemy...

item.title: Connor Undercover Episode 2 Fake Out
item.description: Can Connor and Gisela prove they are masters of disguise? Meanwhile Lily tricks Ty into taking a lame-o microwave cooking class with her. Can Ty bend the rules to have fun anyway?

item.title: Connor Undercover Episode 1 The Time It's Personal
item.description: Connor's dream of spy school is as strong as ever, and he is just one final test away from being accepted to Camp X Spy Academy!

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 21 Off The Map
item.description: The girls of RB Bennett find themselves on a treasure hunt for clues that will solve an old mystery.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 20 To Each His Owen
item.description: Sadie's in a panic to make her family look more 'normal' to impress Owen Anthony.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 19 Best Of Breed
item.description: Sadie finds herself jumping through hoops like a trained poodle to win a speech contest.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 18 Life Cycle
item.description: Margaret attempts to teach Sadie that no-one is perfect, even the seemingly-so Owen Anthony.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 17 Coma Chameleon
item.description: It's reptilian chaos at the Hawthorne's when Sadie brings home the class pet.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 16 Everything's Relative
item.description: A class history project on a Hawthorne ancestor jeopardises Sadie's chances at getting into the 'Roots & Shoots' volunteer program - run by her idol, Jane Goodall herself!

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 15 Everybody Scoops
item.description: Sadie learns a valuable lesson about responsibility and dedication when she lands a job working with a famed animal behaviourist at the zoo.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 14 Unusual Suspects
item.description: Sadie trades her microscope for a magnifying glass as she investigates an unusual disturbance at Finch's.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 13 Myth Adventures
item.description: After-party gossip nearly ruins Sadie's reputation and her chances with Owen Anthony.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 12 Drift Away
item.description: When Sadie and Margaret have a falling out, can the delicious prospect of Hal's impending doom bring them back together?

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 11 Be Our Pest
item.description: When Margaret moves in for a while with the Hawthornes, Sadie discovers that a little Margaret goes a long way.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Episode 10 Best Of Enemies
item.description: Margaret plays misguided matchmaker between Sadie and Tom Yuma.

item.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Episode 22 Hostage Crisis
item.description: Follow the adventures of legendary Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda, along with Anakin's new Padawan learner, Ahsoka Tano, as they struggle against the dark side.

item.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Episode 21 Liberty On Ryloth
item.description: Follow the adventures of legendary Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda, along with Anakin's new Padawan learner, Ahsoka Tano, as they struggle against the dark side.

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 27 Stan Phone Home
item.description: Pat's playing at being an extra terrestrial and it's annoying Stan: there are just some subjects you don't mock! He won't look so clever when a real flying saucer lands in the garden!

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 26 Dig-O-Mania
item.description: Professor Chichi is in his rocket to go destroy a comet which is threatening earth. It's Pat and Stan who are supposed to press the launch button for the rocket: but Pat has misplaced the launch key!

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 25 Pat And Stan Poles
item.description: A meteorite falls into the garden of Pat and Stan and makes a big seemingly bottomless hole. As our heroes are debating in the garden about how deep the hole is, a loud sound startles them and causes them to jump in the hole.

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 24 In Search Of Lost Treasure
item.description: Aunt Martha just came across a strange map in an antique store and invites Pat and Stan to join her in a treasure hunt. With charades, enigmas, adventure and all the rest, what more can you ask for?

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 23 The Hamster Of Bengal
item.description: Stephanie and Pat have offered Stan a hamster to help him calm down. Stephanie thinks the little creature will help his nerves to relax. The problem is the hamster is very aggressive with Stan when no one else is watching.

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 22 Microstan
item.description: Stan meets with Professor Chichi to help him test a laser ray which can increase and reduce the size of things. When alone in the lab, Stan accidently turns himself into an ant size creature...

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 21 Stephanie Love
item.description: It's Pat's birthday. Pat and Stan decide to ask the fantastic Stephanie to help prepare the party. Oddly enough, Stephanie does not seem very willing to cooperate. Does she have something to hide?

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 20 Sting Recall
item.description: Pat barges in announcing to Stan that Lili will be there shortly to give him his flea shot. Not a great day for Stan...but that's the least of his worries. This very day keeps on repeating itself every time he wakes up!

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 19 True-False Bobo
item.description: In order to escape having to go to Aunt Martha's with Pat, Stan fakes being sick. The problem is that Pat really becomes sick and his tail starts to grow and grow to worrying proportions...

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 18 Roll With It
item.description: Pat's latest book gives him the confidence to declare his love to Stephanie. He sneaks under Stephanie's window to recite a poem to her, but three hens who were sleeping behind a bush happen to fall madly in love with Pat.

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 17 Aunt Martha Moves
item.description: Aunt Martha is staying with her nephews but she is turning into a bit of a nightmare for Pat and Stan. Professor Chichi offers his help with his latest invention: the Psycho-switch!

item.title: Pat And Stan Episode 16 Stuart Does Everything
item.description: It's not looking good for the football match: Stuart, their best player is completely lethargic. Pat and Stan decide to take care of Stuart and look after all his tasks, which proves harder than they thought.

item.title: Lizzie McGuire Episode 10 Bad Girl McGuire
item.description: The gang gets 'married' for Social Studies. Lizzie 'marries' Gordo, but is too jealous of Miranda's 'marriage' to the handsome Ethan Craft to pay attention to her 'husband'.

item.title: Lizzie McGuire Episode 9 I Do, I Don't
item.description: The gang gets 'married' for Social Studies. Lizzie 'marries' Gordo, but is too jealous of Miranda's 'marriage' to the handsome Ethan Craft to pay attention to her 'husband'.

item.title: Lizzie McGuire Episode 8 Election
item.description: Lizzie decides to run for class president. With Gordo's help, she becomes a viable candidate. The success, unfortunately, goes to her head, and she turns into a politician. A surprise election result brings her back down to earth.

item.title: Lizzie McGuire Episode 7 Misadventures In Babysitting
item.description: Lizzie's father, Sam, reluctantly allows her to babysit Matt, although he believes Lizzie is still too young for the job. Lizzie struggles to prove him wrong. Even with Gordo and Miranda helping, all heck breaks loose.

item.title: Lizzie McGuire Episode 6 Jack Of All Trades
item.description: Gordo is convinced that his science teacher is out to get him and he's doomed to a career as a blackjack dealer, as his aptitude test suggests. Lizzie and Miranda are less than pleased with the results of their tests as well.

item.title: Lizzie McGuire Episode 5 When Mom Attacks
item.description: Lizzie loves her mom but she's grateful to get away from her for a weekend field trip. Pleasure turns to agony when she learns her mother will be a chaperone on the trip!

item.title: Lizzie McGuire Episode 4 I Got The Rhythmic
item.description: Lizzie is average at everything she attempts, until she finds she is supremely gifted at Rhythmic Gymnastics, widely regarded as the geekiest sport in the universe.

item.title: Lizzie McGuire Episode 3 Rumors
item.description: Lizzie inadvertently starts a rumour about Kate, the most popular girl in school. Miranda takes the blame and Lizzie watches a full-scale war develop between the two as she tries to work up the courage to admit it was her.

item.title: Lizzie McGuire Episode 2 Picture Day
item.description: Class pictures are to be taken, and Lizzie has nothing to wear! Her mother insists she wears the cute red unicorn sweater her grandmother knitted for her. Social embarrassment looms.

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 60 Oggy's Clone
item.description: Jack and Oggy are playing bowls in the garden. The cockroaches discover one of Oggy's costumes in the closet. All three of them jump into the blue suit shaped like Oggy and take advantage of Jack in Oggy's momentary absence.

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 59 A Truce For Christmas
item.description: There's a snow storm raging on Christmas eve. Oggy has had enough of the roaches' nasty antics and he throws them out into the bitter cold. Meanwhile, Jack's car has skidded on the icy road and he runs into a tree.

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 58 The Piggy Bank
item.description: Oggy has decided to put an end to the roaches' pesky behaviour once and for all. He puts a solid padlock on the fridge and hides the key in his piggy-bank. But our friends the roaches have some tricks up their sleeves.

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 57 Happy Campers
item.description: Jack has decided to take his cousin camping. While poor old Oggy gets stuck carrying all the camping gear, Jack is cooling his heels in his indispensable sofa. Is this not paradise?

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 56 Bugball
item.description: Imagine Oggy's surprise when the little ball he's just bought instantly starts bouncing off all the walls and ceiling of the room. Oggy throws the ball and Joey accidently ends up swallowing it!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 55 Winner Takes All
item.description: Oggy and Jack are playing a game of chess. Jack is concentrated on the board but Oggy seems to be drifting off. Joey takes advantage of Oggy's lapse in attention to cause some mischief.

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 54 The Ghost Hunter
item.description: Oggy is trembling from head to toe as he watches a horror film on TV. Disguised as monsters, the three nasty roaches decide to give him something to really be scared of!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 53 A Bird Of Ill Omen
item.description: A turkey runs to hide behind Oggy and in a blink of an eye a hunter appears on the scene. The hunter mistakes Oggy for his prey and the hunt begins as Oggy is chased all over the house!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 52 Oggy And The Magic Flute
item.description: Oggy is fascinated by the magic snake charmer that he sees on TV and decides to make his own magic flute. But the ear-shattering screeches that come out of his home-made flute have a strange and unexpected effect on Marky.

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 51 Duck Soup
item.description: Yum, yum! What luck! Jack and Oggy have caught a duck in the swimming pool. All that's left to do is to choose a good recipe. Is the poor creature doomed to a sizzling end?

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 50 Heatwave
item.description: Oggy is enjoying the sun when suddenly a small cloud appears and projects a shadow directly onto Oggy. Try as he might, no matter where he moves, Oggy can't escape the cloud!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 49 Beware Of Destruction
item.description: Jack has decided to redo the front of Oggy's house. While he breaks for a quick snack, the cockroaches steal his tools in order to build themselves a makeshift pool!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 48 Oggy Vs Super Roach
item.description: When Deedee tries to fix the TV's bad reception due to a thunderstorm outside, he is suddenly struck by lightning. While his pals run to find him first aid, Deedee finds out he has acquired super-powers!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 47 Docu-Mentally
item.description: Armed with a camera, Oggy decides to make a documentary about the cockroaches. Tracked and hunted to even their most private retreats, the three insects hide where they can but, each time, Oggy flushes them out.

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 46 Oggy Goes Snailing
item.description: Oggy becomes friends with a small snail and welcomes him into his home. Upset by the little animal's solitude, Oggy soon gives him a companion. The two lovers don't waste any time and their offspring quickly invade the house!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 45 Oggy And The Cockraoches (8' Version) : The Carnival's In Town
item.description: Oggy is woken up early in the morning by an unusual noise. While he's looking out the window, a huge smile lights up his face: it's a carnival!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 44 Cat Kit
item.description: Jack orders a super cockroach-trap kit. The assembly is a real brainteaser for Jack. To his great surprise, Oggy reveals himself to be a genius in finding and adjusting the right part on the first try...

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 43 Toys R Oggy
item.description: Through one of the cockroaches' latest pranks, Jack's brain, hardly bigger than a chickpea, finds itself unceremoniously ejected from his skull!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 42 Memory Lane
item.description: Oggy comes across the letters from his first love. He immediately reads them with nostalgia, spied upon by the three cockroaches in the shadows.

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 41 The Dictator
item.description: Once again, the cockroaches have made Oggy look ridiculous. At his wits' end, Jack locks the cockroaches up in a cage. Bolstered by this victory, Jack doesn't miss a chance to remind Oggy who is the master in this house.

item.title: CJ The DJ Episode 8 Garage Clip
item.description: CJ, Si and Lesley are walking home when they come across some angry stray dogs in an alleyway. CJ scares the dogs away by playing one of her dad's guitar solos on her mp3 player.

item.title: CJ The DJ Episode 7 Licked In The Mix
item.description: CJ has finished a new mix, her best ever. Si reckons it'll land her a gig at Mad Donna's Skater fest this weekend. But when Lesley reveals her daggy dad loves dancing to her hot new mix, CJ is worried.

item.title: CJ The DJ Episode 6 Original Popcorn
item.description: CJ is about to spin some new tunes to Si, when her sound system is drowned out by the girly pop of Charley's new favourite starlet, Omega Betty. Charley is completely obsessed.

item.title: CJ The DJ Episode 5 The Axe Factor
item.description: CJ receives her first promotional record from a record company and is excited to play it.

item.title: CJ The DJ Episode 4 Droppin' Science
item.description: CJ, Si and Lesley are in science class with CJ's least favourite teacher Mr Truman who also happens to be Deputy Principal. Truman is showing a film about recycling to inspire the kids in their science project.

item.title: CJ The DJ Episode 3 What's In A Name
item.description: In English Class CJ isn't paying attention when discussing Shakespeare. A line from one of the plays leads to CJ wondering if it's her DJ name stopping her from getting the gigs.

item.title: CJ The DJ Episode 2 Ring Ring
item.description: CJ, Si and Lesley check out the new Rough Cut fashion store. Lesley is outraged that the store has taken the place of the former Lucky Puppy Pet Store, while CJ is horrified by the awful instore music.

item.title: CJ The DJ Episode 1 Set Up Gig
item.description: It's the weekend and CJ is still hopeful she'll land a big DJ gig. Back at home, Gene attempts to fix some of the plumbing at home himself with disastrous results.

item.title: Raymond Episode 19 Beware, Evil Dragon
item.description: Following the advice of his idol, Jim Travolthon, Raymond goes to the school drama club. He auditions for the end of year play but Vivian gets the lead role. Raymond has to put up with being ... a pumpkin!

item.title: Raymond Episode 18 Black Is Black
item.description: Raymond has a new neighbour, Lucy... a kind of goth all dressed in black. She thinks he is a bit of an outsider (a loser) and loves his geeky clothes.

item.title: Raymond Episode 17 Operation Pudding
item.description: Raymond goes to the petrol station with his mum, and is amazed to see Jim Travolthon himself washing cars. He cannot get over it and just to be sure he decides to go back the next day... By any means necessary!

item.title: Raymond Episode 16 Nitroturboboost
item.description: The TV-shopping channel has a weird helmet on offer, called nitro-turboost, which is supposed to help transform an ordinary man into Jim Travolthon!

item.title: Shaolin Wuzang Episode 2
item.description: Three teenagers are admitted in the most prestigious kung fu school: the Temple of Shaolin. Unknown to them, they are the reincarnation of three Shaolin monks who must destroy the worst demon with Kung Fu.

item.title: Shaolin Wuzang Episode 1
item.description: Three teenagers are admitted in the most prestigious kung fu school: the Temple of Shaolin. Unknown to them, they are the reincarnation of three Shaolin monks who must destroy the worst demon with Kung Fu.

item.title: Letterbox Episode 15
item.description: Hosted by actor and country music singer Adam James, Letterbox is a children's game show concentrating on grammar and spelling with special Indigenous language segments.

item.title: Letterbox Episode 14
item.description: Hosted by actor and country music singer Adam James, Letterbox is a children's game show concentrating on grammar and spelling with special Indigenous language segments.

item.title: Letterbox Episode 13
item.description: Hosted by actor and country music singer Adam James, Letterbox is a children's game show concentrating on grammar and spelling with special Indigenous language segments.

item.title: Letterbox Episode 12
item.description: Hosted by actor and country music singer Adam James, Letterbox is a children's game show concentrating on grammar and spelling with special Indigenous language segments.

item.title: Wolverine And The X-Men Episode 20 Breakdown
item.description: Cyclops is mid-fight with the X-Men when he sees Jean in the background. Or thinks he sees her. Distracted by his vision he gets pummelled. He wakes up in the infirmary at the X-Mansion.

item.title: Wolverine And The X-Men Episode 19 Guardian Angel
item.description: Warren Worthington Jr. has been helping fellow mutants despite his father's help in Senator Kelly's anti-mutant campaigns. Worthington Sr. finds his son's efforts interfering with his work and decides to call the MRD.

item.title: Wolverine And The X-Men Episode 18 Backlash
item.description: Forge has managed to break the code of the Sentinel data they stole from the Trask Lab and reports that Master Mold is an AI computer that operates all of the city's Sentinels and appears to be same Master Mold Xavier is battling in the future.

item.title: Wolverine And The X-Men Episode 17 Code Of Conduct
item.description: Logan arrives back to the X-Mansion to find Rogue tied to a chair and the rest of the X-Men kidnapped. He can smell the scent of the ninjas that took his friends. Immediately he knows Harada, the Silver Samurai is behind it.

item.title: Silverwing Episode 4 Bat In The Belfry
item.description: Shade and Marina meet Zephyr, a mystical oracle who bestows on them the power of prophecy. When Throbb's poor navigation lands the colony in trouble he admits they need a guide in the unfamiliar sky.

item.title: Silverwing Episode 3 Pigeon Court
item.description: Captured by vengeful pigeons, Shade and Marina hatch a plan to escape and search the city for the Cathedral from Ariel's sound map. When the colony arrives, they spot two owls waiting and abandon hope of stopping.

item.title: Silverwing Episode 2 No Bat Is An Island
item.description: Shade meets fellow outcast Marina and they join forces to return to Silverwing. In the Colony, Bathsheba takes advantage of everyone's unhappiness by lobbying for power over Frieda.

item.title: Silverwing Episode 1 A Glimpse Of The Son
item.description: Shade Silverwing is an undersized teenage bat whose bravado sets in motion a personal odyssey set against an adventure of epic proportions. Shade's one act of rebellion puts his whole colony in grave danger and threatens the forest's fragile peace.

item.title: Total Drama Action Episode 16 Dial M For Merger
item.description: Lindsay and Courtney win the reward - a trip to the local, stinky cheese factory!

item.title: Total Drama Action Episode 15 Million Dollar Babies
item.description: Leshawna's play for her teammates is just sincere enough to earn her the votes to stay. It's Heather who's headed home - to a fresh weave for her bald, patchy head.

item.title: Total Drama Action Episode 14 One Million Bucks B.C.
item.description: A fur-bikini-clad Courtney delivers the crippling blow that sends Duncan into a tar pit, winning the Grips the day's big reward - a mammoth-sized prehistoric barbecue.

item.title: Total Drama Action Episode 13 Ocean's 8 Or 9
item.description: This week's bank heist challenge starts with the teams having to blow a safe and rescue either Owen or Leshawna from within, along with some bank robbing tools.

item.title: Best Ed Episode 2 Best Ediquette
item.description: After Ed volunteers Buddy to host a very important gathering of the Royal Nut Club, Ed dedicates his best efforts to helping Buddy make a great impression and become a member of the club.

item.title: Best Ed Episode 1 Rub My Ed For Luck
item.description: It's Ed's lucky day! While doing some light yardwork, Ed discovers a golden acorn, then leads Buddy, Thursty, Miss Fluff, and the Kitten Twins on a search for the Lost Treasure of Swellville.

item.title: Girls In Love Episode 2 Getting Lippy
item.description: It's the house party everyone's been talking about! Ellie sees beyond Dan's geeky exterior and at last gets her first kiss! But regret soon follows when the terrible truth about Dan is revealed!

item.title: Girls In Love Episode 1 My Big Lie
item.description: It's the start of Year 9 but Ellie wishes she'd stayed in bed. When Magda and Nadine boast of endless snogging, Ellie fibs with tales of a holiday romance. Magda sets up a triple-date - will Ellie find a boyfriend in time?

item.title: Gawayn Episode 30 The Secret of Roddy's Success
item.description: When the Duke looks through Roddy's school year book, he contacts Roddy's nemesis to thwart the Questers.

item.title: Gawayn Episode 29 Good Luck In Bad Luck Forest
item.description: The GBM tells the Questers to get a Good Luck Charm. The trouble is they have to enter the Bad Luck Forest.

item.title: Gawayn Episode 28 Duped By The Duck
item.description: While frantically searching for his whistle, Roderick meets a young, polite lad who helps him.

item.title: Gawayn Episode 27 Mr Pants
item.description: The Great Book of Magic instructs the Questers to get a one-eyed teddy bear that will open a portal to another land.

item.title: Gawayn Episode 26 Hey Dude, Where's My Gwenmobile?
item.description: After eating in a tavern, the Questers discover that the Gwenmobile has been stolen by the Heaven's Devils, a ferocious gang who ride cycles.

item.title: Gawayn Episode 25 Vroom!
item.description: The Great Book of Magic instructs the Questers to enter a car race and win first prize: A kiss from the gorgeous Miss Vroom.

item.title: Gawayn Episode 24 All Aboard!
item.description: When the Questers are caught stowing away on a pirate cruise ship, they must work off their journey by taking care of some very important and annoying guests.

item.title: Gawayn Episode 23 Again And Again
item.description: The Questers finally reach the end of their quest and are about to take the crystal of Gawain.

item.title: Barney's Barrier Reef Episode 13 Family Ties - Can Live With Them, Can't Live Without Them
item.description: Barney Harwood and Gemma Hunt find out about family ties under the sea.

item.title: Barney's Barrier Reef Episode 12 Senses - A Tional
item.description: Barney and Gemma investigate creatures with super senses in the Barrier Reef.

item.title: Barney's Barrier Reef Episode 11 Getting From A To Be
item.description: Barney and Gemma meet walking sharks, hitchhiking shrimps and squids with jet propulsion.

item.title: Barney's Barrier Reef Episode 10 Nightshift - Sleepless In The Sea
item.description: Barney and Gemma find out what happens in the Great Barrier Reef in the hours of darkness.

item.title: My Place Episode 13 1888 Victoria (Final Episode)
item.description: 1888 - Victoria and her family have just moved into the terrace house that her father has built. She'll do anything to ensure that they stay there forever - including witchcraft.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 50 (Final)
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 49
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 48
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 47
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 46
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 45
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 40
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 39
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 38
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 37
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Go Lingo! Episode 36
item.description: An exciting high energy game show where contestants aged 11 to 12, battle it out during games focusing on spelling, grammar and Australia's Indigenous culture.

item.title: Yakkity Yak Episode 26 (Final) : Home School/ The Onion Falls 500
item.description: Fed up with school, Yakkity and Keo decide to let Keo's Dad home school them./Race fever hits as the first annual Onion Falls 500 Go-Kart race is announced. 1st prize is a year's supply of Professor Crazyhair's egg salad.

item.title: Yakkity Yak Episode 25 Daddy Uh-Oh/ Yaks A Plenty
item.description: Everyone's devastated when Keo's Dad announces the family is broke and they will have to move./ Yakkity decides to use a 'Alan Amoeba' video to pass a biology test but didn't count on becoming part of Alan Amoeba's world.

item.title: Yakkity Yak Episode 24 Onion Fall's Most Wanted/ Blue Rinse Test
item.description: Yakkity is convinced that Trilo is behind the so-called Bubblegum Bandit terrorising Onion Falls. /After failing her driver's licence test, Granny decides that it's time to move to an old person's home.

item.title: Yakkity Yak Episode 23 My Fair Crazy Hair/ Practically Funny
item.description: Yakkity's nose gets out of joint when Granny dates the suave Chatterbox Ox - who's secretly an operative for a wannabe master criminal. /Yakkity and Keo get sick of bearing the brunt of Rondo's practical jokes.

item.title: Yakkity Yak Episode 22 Rondo Reversal/ Damage Is Done
item.description: When Yakkity observes Rondo's not-so-tough-guy habits include a lovely falsetto singing voice, he tells everyone at school./Chuck Damage is brought in to get Yakkity into shape.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 15 (Final) : Jagged Little Pill
item.description: Emma, the 12-year old daughter of Degrassi Junior High alumnus, Spike, and her schoolmates encounter the same pressures, temptations and issues of adolescence and junior high school that their parents generation did.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 14 Under Pressure
item.description: Faced with the pressure of passing Grade 7 on his second time around and his mother's newest threat to take him back to his unhappy life up north, Sean is beginning to slip into old, angry patterns.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Episode 13 Cabaret
item.description: Ashley's convinced that she and Terri are going to be the stars of the school talent show, singing her new (and incredibly earnest) ballad. Terri would rather add Paige - and some fun and sparkle to the act.

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 20 (Final) : Night Of The Missing Goat Knuckles
item.description: Follow the funny adventures of 15-year-old Summer Farley as she tries to fit in to a new neighbourhood and new school which is populated by werewolves, zombies, vampires ghosts and ghouls. CAST: Sophie Stuckey

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 19 Banned
item.description: When Igor's ornamental skull gets stolen, Summer makes a mistake and suggests that it might have been Rolf and Serena. Unless their names are cleared, Serena has promised to inflict infinite pain on Summer, Heidi and Bobby.

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 18 I Dated A Teenage Vampire
item.description: Max is a bad, bad boy and very annoying. Cute, but annoying! Can Summer fix him, or is it true that a leopard never changes his spots or a vampire his teeth?

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 17 I Dated A Teenage Vampire
item.description: Max is a bad, bad boy and very annoying. Cute, but annoying! Can Summer fix him, or is it true that a leopard never changes his spots or a vampire his teeth?

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 16 The Vanishing Brain
item.description: The problem with living with a crazy inventor is that when they meddle in science they don't understand, your memory can accidentally be wiped...

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 15 Double Date Of Doom
item.description: Who is taking who to the Tapeworm Relief fundraiser at the Stakeout? Do Heidi and Summer want to ask the same boy or has Bobby got his fur crossed?

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 14 Dance Of The Vampires
item.description: As Head of the Social Committee, Serena is always in charge of organising the Fang Fest Fling Ball every year. Summer is outraged that it's for couples only and challenges Serena to a school vote.

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 13 Beware Of The Triangle
item.description: Ok, is Bobby dating Summer behind Heidi's back? Or is he dating Heidi behind Summer's back? Whichever it is, Serena is having fun telling both girls that they are not such close friends as they thought the were!

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 12 The Bug
item.description: Magda told a few white lies and told her sister Helga that she is married to Summer and Jake's dad! Now Bug, her nephew, is on his way to meet Summer after hearing so much about her in his Aunt's letters home!

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 11 The Mummy's Curse
item.description: There is no such thing as a bad luck curse. So there is no way that Summer has invoked the Mummy's Curse by accidently selling the friendship bracelet that Heidi gave her...

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 10 I Had An Evil Twin
item.description: Magda has set Summer up on a blind date with the boy she knows from the pig farm. Summer meets the gorgeous Rex but soon discovers he is not the boy that Magda knows. She may have accidently stolen somebody else's blind date!

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 9 It lived In A Brain Jar
item.description: Summer is grounded for behaving irresponsibly. Just how responsible is it of Dad to leave his and Leo's new experiment the Brain Derangement Probe lying around?

item.title: Summer In Transylvania Episode 8 Day Of The Prickly Waitress
item.description: When Summer tells Magda that all housekeepers except her get a day off every week, Magda resigns! Summer has to take over as Housekeeper/plumber/electrician and pig masseur!

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 33 Home
item.description: The Legend of Dick and Dom is an adventure-comedy that features magic and monsters galore. Set in the year 1207, it follows the princes Dick (Richard McCourt) and Dom (Dominic Wood) of Fyredor, in Bottom World.

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 32 Cabbage Ball Secret
item.description: The Legend of Dick and Dom is an adventure-comedy that features magic and monsters galore. Set in the year 1207, it follows the princes Dick (Richard McCourt) and Dom (Dominic Wood) of Fyredor, in Bottom World.

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 31 Cabbage Ball Run
item.description: The Legend of Dick and Dom is an adventure-comedy that features magic and monsters galore. Set in the year 1207, it follows the princes Dick (Richard McCourt) and Dom (Dominic Wood) of Fyredor, in Bottom World.

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 30 Numbskull Of The Beast
item.description: The Legend of Dick and Dom is an adventure-comedy that features magic and monsters galore. Set in the year 1207, it follows the princes Dick (Richard McCourt) and Dom (Dominic Wood) of Fyredor, in Bottom World.

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 29 Forget Me Nuts
item.description: The Legend of Dick and Dom is an adventure-comedy that features magic and monsters galore. Set in the year 1207, it follows the princes Dick (Richard McCourt) and Dom (Dominic Wood) of Fyredor, in Bottom World.

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 28 Land Of The Luvvies
item.description: The Legend of Dick and Dom is an adventure-comedy that features magic and monsters galore. Set in the year 1207, it follows the princes Dick (Richard McCourt) and Dom (Dominic Wood) of Fyredor, in Bottom World.

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 27 Valley Of The Big Heads
item.description: The Legend of Dick and Dom is an adventure-comedy that features magic and monsters galore. Set in the year 1207, it follows the princes Dick (Richard McCourt) and Dom (Dominic Wood) of Fyredor, in Bottom World.

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 26 The Magic Oblong
item.description: The Legend of Dick and Dom is an adventure-comedy that features magic and monsters galore. Set in the year 1207, it follows the princes Dick (Richard McCourt) and Dom (Dominic Wood) of Fyredor, in Bottom World.

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 25 The Loopy Tribe
item.description: The Legend of Dick and Dom is an adventure-comedy that features magic and monsters galore. Set in the year 1207, it follows the princes Dick (Richard McCourt) and Dom (Dominic Wood) of Fyredor, in Bottom World.

item.title: The Legend Of Dick & Dom Episode 24
item.description: Having successfully made the antidote to the terrible plague afflicting their kingdom, the race is on for Princes Dick and Dom to make it home with the cure. But saving the day is never as easy as that. CAST: Dominic Wood

item.title: Monk Episode 52 (Final) : Monk Investigates
item.description: Monk is a mischievous little dog! He gets over exited and has an unfortunate tendency to lose his cool when he gets upset. When things aren't working out for Monk, catastrophes tend to follow...

item.title: Monk Episode 45 Monk Plays Golf
item.description: Monk S1 - Monk is a mischievous little dog! He gets over exited and has an unfortunate tendency to lose his cool when he gets upset. When things aren't working out for Monk, catastrophes follow. Monk gets annoyed by the tiniest things and when he blows his top, things can quickly get out of control.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 20 Final : Peru
item.description: Steve Backshall is tracking down the most deadly animals on the planet, this time from the frozen tundra of the Arctic to the jungles of South America. One thing remains, whatever their size, these animals are truly deadly!

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 19 Argentina
item.description: Steve and his trusty crew explore the Argentinean marshes cowboy style. An anaconda hunt turns painfully wrong when our intrepid explorer steps on something in the murky water.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 18 United Kingdom
item.description: Steve scuba dives in a lake and has encounters with a number of pike, explaining how down here this monster fears nothing as it is top of the food chain.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 17 Norway
item.description: Steve and the team are in the frozen north of Norway. Animals here face serious challenges just trying to survive in these sub-zero temperatures. The team head to the hills in search of the elusive Lynx.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 16 Romania
item.description: In Romania Steve and the team stay out all night in a hide and have an encounter with a wild wolf that has damaged its leg.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 15 Philippines
item.description: The Deadly 60 team are back in the Philippines. They visit a shark cleaning station where Steve gets in the water and sees two Thresher Sharks.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 14 Philippines
item.description: The Deadly 60 team are back in the Philippines. They visit a shark cleaning station where Steve gets in the water and sees two Thresher Sharks.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 13 Thailand
item.description: In Thailand, Steve comes face to face with the longest venomous snake in the world, the King Cobra whose bite could kill an elephant and he meets two of Thailand's killer cats for a deadly cat face off.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 12 Uganda
item.description: Steve is in Uganda, on a challenge to meet some of our closest deadly relatives - the primates. He takes the crew trekking high up into the Virunga Mountains to spend an hour face to face with huge mountain gorillas.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 11 Madagascar
item.description: Steve and the team head for the rainforests of Madagascar. They travel across the vast island looking for contenders for the Deadly 60.

item.title: Deadly 60 Episode 10 Namibia
item.description: Steve's hot on the trail of Africa's big cats. He dons a camouflage suit to beat a leopard at its own game and catches up with a pride of lions.

item.title: Dead Gorgeous Episode 13 (final) : Old Ghosts
item.description: Sophie is possessed by a ghost with a score to settle and it's a race against time for her sisters to save her from expulsion. CAST: Melissa Howard, Poppy Lee Friar

item.title: Dead Gorgeous Episode 12 Love's First Kiss
item.description: Rebecca's affections are tested when an old family portrait is unveiled as one of Ainsbury's hidden treasures.

item.title: Freefonix Episode 40 The World's Hottest Band
item.description: When one of Nerdry's experiments goes wrong, Mantyz accidentally acquire a heat energy so powerful that they become the World's Hottest Band - literally!

item.title: Freefonix Episode 39 Nine To Fivish
item.description: When Mya advertises for a personal assistant BB applies for the job in order to gain inside information about recent strange power surges in Losbosmos.
